articles.description: Pankaj Tripathi stepped into the shoes of former Prime Minister, Atal Bihari Vajpayee in the upcoming film, 'Main Atal Hoon.' After the trailer release, a scene from the film caught the attention of all on social media.
articles.content: After the makers of the Pankaj Tripathi-starrer released the trailer of the upcoming film 'Main Atal Hoon', a scene from the movie has gone viral on social media. The film, directed by National Award… [+1431 chars]

articles.author: Neelima Menon
articles.title: Year Ender 2023: 11 best celluloid moments of Malayalam cinema this year - Moneycontrol
articles.description: With around 250 Malayalam films released this year, mostly OTT rejects, or planned for OTT but were forced to release in theatres, only a handful stayed on in our memory. Here's a list of some of the most stirring frames from 11 films
articles.content: There is a striking paradox in Malayalam cinema this year. There was a Tsunami of films that were released this year (roughly 250), which were mostly OTT rejects (or planned for OTT but were forced t… [+7146 chars]
